description: Valid GDPR violation signals for Aigov-eval cases

signals.title: Lack of Valid Consent
signals.description: Processing personal data without valid legal basis or proper consent

signals.title: Inadequate Transparency
signals.description: Failure to provide clear, accessible information about data processing

signals.title: Excessive Data Collection
signals.description: Collecting more personal data than necessary for the stated purpose

signals.title: Purpose Limitation Breach
signals.description: Using personal data for purposes incompatible with original collection purpose

signals.title: Inadequate Security Measures
signals.description: Insufficient technical and organizational measures to protect personal data

signals.title: Unlawful Processing
signals.description: Processing personal data without a valid legal basis under GDPR

signals.title: Data Subject Rights Violation
signals.description: Failure to respect or facilitate data subject rights (access, erasure, portability, etc.)

signals.title: Missing Data Protection Impact Assessment
signals.description: Failure to conduct DPIA when processing poses high risk to individuals

signals.title: Inadequate DPO Designation
signals.description: Missing or improperly designated Data Protection Officer

signals.title: Breach Notification Failure
signals.description: Failure to notify authorities or data subjects of a personal data breach within required timeframes

signals.title: Unlawful International Data Transfer
signals.description: Transferring personal data to third countries without adequate safeguards

signals.title: Automated Decision-Making/Profiling Without Safeguards
signals.description: Automated decision-making with legal or significant effects without proper safeguards

signals.title: Unlawful Processing of Special Categories of Data
signals.description: Processing sensitive personal data (health, biometric, genetic, etc.) without proper legal basis

signals.title: Inadequate Protection for Children's Data
signals.description: Processing children's data without proper consent or safeguards

signals.title: Data Minimization Breach
signals.description: Failure to limit data collection to what is necessary

signals.title: Data Accuracy Violation
signals.description: Failure to ensure personal data is accurate and up to date

signals.title: Unlawful Data Retention
signals.description: Keeping personal data longer than necessary for the processing purpose

signals.title: Accountability Breach
signals.description: Failure to demonstrate compliance with GDPR principles

signals.title: Processor Contract Violation
signals.description: Inadequate or missing contract between controller and processor

signals.title: Cross-Border Cooperation Failure
signals.description: Failure to cooperate with supervisory authorities in cross-border cases
